definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Visual</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">hookshot_reticle</field><field name="comment">The display type shown when you're looking at a block that can be hookshotted. Available types: OUTLINE, GLOW, OFF</field><value name="value"><block type="config_text_variable"><field name="name">Hookshot Reticle Type</field><field name="value">OUTLINE</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">particle_trail</field><field name="comment">Changes whether this mod's arrows will spawn trail particles</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Show Arrow Particle Trail</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Hookshot</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">only_targets</field><field name="comment">If enabled, the hookshot/longshot will only be able to attach to the 'hookshot target' block</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Only Hit Targets</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
